entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, a boy who is interacting with a boa constrictor.

entities.name: boa constrictor
entities.description: A snake that is being kept in a zoo and is interacting with Harry.

entities.name: brazil
entities.description: A country where the boa constrictor was bred.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Harry's cousin who is also interacting with the boa constrictor.

entities.name: piers
entities.description: A person who is with Dudley and reacts in horror to the snake escaping.

relationships.description: Harry is interacting with the boa constrictor, reading a sign next to its tank.
Dudley reacts in horror when he sees the snake escaping from its tank.
Piers also reacts in horror when he sees the snake escaping from its tank.
